author: hollowstrawberry
description: Scans images for AI parameters and other metadata. Supports context menus.
install_msg:
ðŸ“Ž __**ImageScanner**__ ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load imagescanner
2. Add channels to scan with [p]scanset channel add
3a. Optionally, enable the context menu command with [p]slash enablecog imagescanner
  3b. Sync application commands with [p]slash sync
  3c. You may need to restart Discord to see the new command.```
short: Scans images for AI parameters and other metadata. Supports context menus.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
